subHeading: Tired of dating apps? Your partner left you for someone else? Get a furbaby instead. With Swipet, you get the love you deserve.
featureHeading: Adopting a pet has never been easier

features.name: profile
features.title: Let them know you
features.description: Flex your best qualities on your profile. Show your interests. Let it scream, “I'm the best fur parent in the whole world!”.

features.name: match
features.title: Match with your perfect buddy
features.description: Swipe to the right for the pet you like until you get your match.

features.name: chat
features.title: Get to know them
features.description: Chat with the keeper of your match pet, and learn more about them.

features.name: adopt
features.title: Adopt
features.description: Adopt, don't shop. Make a deal with the pet keeper, and become a certified fur parent.

footerBanner:
Your bestfriend is
waiting for you
swipetDescription: Swipet is a mobile application that makes pet adoption fun and easier.
copyright: Copyright © 2022 Swipet, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
404Message: Wooofs! We can't sniff out the page you're looking for.
cookieP1: Swipet stores cookies on your computer. These cookies are used in order to improve and customize your browsing experience and for analytics and metrics about our visitors both on this website and other media. To learn more, see our <Link> Privacy Policy.</Link>
cookieP2: By using our site you agree to our use of cookies.
chatBotMessage2: How may I help you? Below list are the topics I can help you with.
showOptions: Below list are the topics I can help you with.
handleUnkownKeywords: I don't understand. Can you ask again using a few key words or choose from any of the topics below.
adoptionProcessReplyBot1: Once you have matched with a pet that liked you back, the adoption process will be a personal transaction between you and the pet handler through our chat feature.
adoptionProcessReplyBot2: But here are some steps of what you can expect especially if the pet is from an animal shelter:
adoptionProcessReplyBot3: The pet adoption steps mentioned above may differ because some may have an additional step or two that you need to go through to proceed with the adoption.
handlePaperworksReply: The paperwork needed to adopt will be provided by the pet handler of your matched pet.
handleRequirementsReply: Are you ready to adopt? Here are the basic requirements for you to be qualified:
handleRequirementsReplyFollowUp: Take note that these are just the basic requirements and may vary, some pet owners may require more than what is on the given list.

adoptionProcessList.title: Fill out same form
adoptionProcessList.text: You may need to fill up a questionnaire or an adoption application form provided by them.

adoptionProcessList.title: Interview
adoptionProcessList.text: Others may conduct an interview to know more about you and if you have the capability to care for a pet. They may also answer questions you may have.

adoptionProcessList.title: Meet and Greet
adoptionProcessList.text: Here is when you get the chance to meet the pet in person and bond with them.

adoptionProcessList.title: Finalizing the Adoption
adoptionProcessList.text: Once you have passed and gone through all the other steps, the final thing to do is you would need to sign some paperwork and others may require you to pay certain fees.

requirementsList.text: Can cover all the financial expenses of owning a pet.
Has a secure and suitable home for a pet.
Has the time to train and socialise with a pet to give them enough company so they don’t get lonely.
